author: jstrachan
msg: Temporarily backed out some changes that depend on newer versions of Jexl.
Once Jexl handles sub-expression resolvers, so that ${a.b.c == 'foo'} can work with Ant-style naming of properties, we'll swizzle this code back again.

author: jstrachan
msg: added new JellyUnit tests for <choose> and <if> tags

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <choose> tag to work properly with the new Tag-local-per-thread and Script shareable-across-threads model.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch so that when Jelly is ran and seperate threads are created (such as by JellySwing) then there are no IOException exceptions thrown when Jelly scripts are called asynchronously.

author: jstrachan
msg: added <windowListener> tag so that window listeners can be defined using Jelly script
unfortunately there's a minor bug in the demo where the stream gets closed after the UI is displayed, so that when the window is closed we get an IOException.
